person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The number of plastic surgeries in Brazil has jumped 30 percent to an estimated 150,000 this year since an anti-inflation plan was introduced in July 1994 , Farid Hakme , the president of the Brazilian Plastic Surgery Society ( SBCP ) , said .

Let's think step by step.

The "Person" entities in the paragraph are:

1. Farid Hakme
2. The president of the Brazilian Plastic Surgery Society (SBCP) (mentioned as Farid Hakme)

Therefore, the "Person" entities in the paragraph are Farid Hakme and the president of the Brazilian Plastic Surgery Society (SBCP), who are the same person.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

Sure, my apologies for the mistake. Here are the "Person" entities in the paragraph after removing irrelevant entities:

1. Farid Hakme

Therefore, the only "Person" entity in the paragraph is Farid Hakme.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the Markdown table with the "Person" entities in the paragraph:

| Person |
| --- |
| Farid Hakme |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
